p: Two separate experiments were carried out under the same experimental conditions. In both cases, all DENV strains were able to infect mosquitoes, disseminate and be transmitted. No significant difference was found in rates obtained from these two independent vector competence experiments (Fisherâ€™s exact test: p-values > 0.05) ( Table 2). Consequently, both datasets were pooled for further global analysis as described hereafter.
